welcome_message_body: "Welcome to Rockcreek, the charming city known for its beautiful nature trails, local shops, and friendly community. We invite you to explore our city and enjoy all it has to offer during your stay."

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Portland Airport serves all commercial flights and houses various amenities for travelers.

terminals.name: Private Terminal
terminals.description: The private terminal at Portland Airport caters to private and charter flights, offering a more exclusive and personalized experience.

wifi.note: Complimentary WiFi is available throughout the airport, with no time or data limits.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal of Portland International Airport, serving both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Concourse A
terminals.description: A concourse in the main terminal, primarily used for domestic flights operated by Alaska Airlines.

terminals.name: Concourse B
terminals.description: A concourse in the main terminal, primarily used for domestic flights operated by Delta Air Lines.

terminals.name: Concourse C
terminals.description: A concourse in the main terminal, primarily used for domestic flights operated by United Airlines.

terminals.name: International Terminal
terminals.description: A separate terminal for international flights, with customs and immigration facilities.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport, with no time limit.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Troutdale Airport serves both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Private Terminal
terminals.description: The private terminal at Troutdale Airport caters to private and charter flights.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Mal Airport serves both domestic and international flights.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.
